price: 1. Alif, lâm, râ(1). Buku eye mikapo miango mibongisami na lolenge ya kitoko mpe milimbolami na oyo atonda bwanya, moyebi ya ba sango.
arabic: الٓرۚ كِتَٰبٌ أُحۡكِمَتۡ ءَايَٰتُهُۥ ثُمَّ فُصِّلَتۡ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ خَبِيرٍ
footnotes: 1 Alif, Lâm, Râ: Bótala suratu Al-Baqarah mokopo: 1.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra kitābun uḥ'kimat āyātuhu thumma fuṣṣilat min ladun ḥakīmin khabīrin
